title: BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On QCoal Proposal
text:
BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On QCoal Proposal

Stock Markets 49 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 18:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On QCoal Proposal Sept 13 (Reuters) - Bounty Mining Ltd : * UPDATES ON QCOAL PROPOSAL * NON-INTERESTED DIRECTORS DETERMINED THAT FURTHER REVISED QCOAL PROPOSAL NOT SUPERIOR TO RECAPITALISATION PROPOSAL CO ENTERED INTO * NON-INTERESTED DIRECTORS CONFIRM AMAROO PROPOSAL IN BEST INTERESTS OF CO; RECOMMEND SHAREHOLDERS VOTE IN FAVOUR OF THE RESOLUTIONS * NON-INTERESTED DIRECTORS TO VOTE B2Y SHARES THEY HOLD/CONTROL IN FAVOUR OF AMAROO PROPOSAL RESOLUTIONS, IN ABSENCE OF SUPERIOR PROPOSAL

BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On QCoal Proposal
